column.name: SecDateTEntry
column.summary: Timestamp automatically generated and user not allowed to change. The actual date of entry.

column.name: SecDateTEdit
column.summary: Automatically updated by MySQL every time a row is added or changed.

column.name: TrustedEtransFlags
column.summary: Bit flags. None (0) by default. Stores trusted user selected X12 transaction types related to this carrier.

column.name: DateIllnessInjuryPreg
column.summary: Date of Current Illness, Injury, or Pregnancy (LMP). (LMP = Last Menstrual Period) For use in 1500 Medical Claim Form box 14. Identifies the first date of onset of illness, the actual date of injury, or the LMP for pregnancy.

column.name: DateIllnessInjuryPregQualifier
column.summary: Enum:DateIllnessInjuryPregQualifier 3 digit code used in 1500 Medical Claim Form, 'Qual' box of field 14. Valid values are 431 or 484.

Enumeration.name: DateIllnessInjuryPregQualifier
Enumeration.EnumValue: 431 - Onset of Current Symptoms or Illness

column.name: DateOther
column.summary: Another date related to the patient's condition or treatment. For use in 1500 Medical Claim Form box 15.

column.name: DateOtherQualifier
column.summary: Enum:DateOtherQualifier 3 digit code used in 1500 Medical Claim Form, 'Qual' box of field 15. Valid values are 090, 091, 304, 439, 444, 453,454, 455, and 471.

Enumeration.name: DateOtherQualifier
Enumeration.summary: Used for 1500 Medical Claim Form, 'Qual' box portion of fields 14 and 15. Populate with 3 digit enum value.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 453 - Acute Manifestation of a Chronic Condition

column.name: IsOutsideLab
column.summary: Used in 1500 Medical Claim Form field 20. Place an 'X' the 'Yes' if true and the 'No' if false.

column.name: CanChargeWhenNoBal
column.summary: Set true to indicate the Credit Card in question can be charged when the Patient account balance is $0, which corresponds directly to a preference called "RecurringChargesAllowedWhenPatNoBal" (true by default) which must be turned on via Module>Account>Misc to be available.

column.name: EClipboardSheetDefNum
column.summary: Primary key.

column.name: SheetDefNum
column.summary: FK to SheetDef.SheetDefNum.

column.name: ClinicNum
column.summary: FK to clinic.ClinicNum. 0 if no clinic or if default clinic.

column.name: ResubmitInterval
column.summary: Indicates the acceptable amount of time that can pass since the last time the patient has filled this sheet out. Once this has elapsed, if the EClipboardCreateMissingFormsOnCheckIn pref is turned on, this sheet will automatically be added to the patient sheets to fill out when the patient is checked-in.

column.name: ItemOrder
column.summary: The order in which the patient will be asked to fill out this sheet.

column.name: HtmlType
column.summary: Enum:EmailType

Enumeration.name: EmailType
Enumeration.EnumValue: 0 - This is a regular email that may contain our special wiki markup.
1 - Html. Basic html email which uses the master template.
2 - More advanced html that does not include the master template, user must provide everything.

column.name: TemplateType
column.summary: Enum:EmailType

Enumeration.name: EmailType
Enumeration.EnumValue: 0 - This is a regular email that may contain our special wiki markup.
1 - Html. Basic html email which uses the master template.
2 - More advanced html that does not include the master template, user must provide everything.

column.name: SecDateTEdit
column.summary: Automatically updated by MySQL every time a row is added or changed.

column.name: LoginAttemptNum
column.summary: Primary key.

column.name: UserName
column.summary: The username that was attempted. May not be a username that exists.

column.name: LoginType
column.summary: Enum:UserWebFKeyType The part of the program where an attempt was made. If we want to use this for other parts of the program that are do not use the userweb table, we can change this enum to a different one.

Enumeration.name: UserWebFKeyType
Enumeration.summary: The type of row that identifies which table FKey links to.
Enumeration.EnumValue: This is a default value that should never be saved into the table.

column.name: DateTFail
column.summary: When the failed attempt was attempted.

column.name: PatNum
column.summary: FK to patient.PatNum. Indicates which patient is currently using the device. 0 indicates the device is not in use. -1 indicates that the device is in use but we do not yet know which patient is using the device.

column.name: LastCheckInActivity
column.summary: The date and time when we last updated the PatNum field for this device (indication the current use-state of the device).

column.name: SecDateTEntry
column.summary: Timestamp automatically generated and user not allowed to change. The actual date of entry.

column.name: SecDateTEdit
column.summary: Automatically updated by MySQL every time a row is added or changed.

column.name: ExternalId
column.summary: External Id

column.name: PaymentStatus
column.summary: Enum:PaymentStatus

column.name: Urgency
column.summary: Enum:ProcUrgency Used in 1500 Medical Claim Form box 24c. Normal=blank 24c,Emergency='Y' in 24c.

Enumeration.name: ProcUrgency
Enumeration.summary: Used for marking procedures on medical claims as 'Emergency' on the 1500 claim form.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 0 - Standard procedure urgency. Most procedures will have this ProcUrgency. This will result in the 1500 Medical Claim Form box 24c being blank. (Normal=blank,Emergency='Y')
1 - Emergency ProcUrgency is used to populate the 1500 Medical Claim Form box 24c with a 'Y'. (Emergency='Y',Normal=blank)

column.name: ProvNum
column.summary: FK to provider.ProvNum. Holds the ProvNum for this procedure's provider.

column.name: DateTP
column.summary: Holds the DateTP for this procedure.

column.name: ClinicNum
column.summary: FK to clinic.ClinicNum. Holds the ClinicNum for this procedure's clinic.

column.name: ScheduledProcessNum
column.summary: Primary Key

column.name: ScheduledAction
column.summary: Enum:ScheduledActionEnum

Enumeration.name: ScheduledActionEnum
Enumeration.summary: Action to be selected by user when scheduling. When adding a new value to this Enum add a case for it in the ScheduledProcessThread in OpendentalService and a method to handle the action.

column.name: TimeToRun
column.summary: What time of the day it's supposed to run.

column.name: FrequencyToRun
column.summary: Enum:FrequencyToRunEnum

Enumeration.name: FrequencyToRunEnum
Enumeration.summary: Frequency with which an action will be run. When adding a new value to this Enum add a case for it in the ScheduledProcessThread in OpendentalService with the logic to check if the action should be run.

column.name: LastRanDateTime
column.summary: Date and time when process last ran.

column.name: SecDateTEdit
column.summary: Automatically updated by MySQL every time a row is added or changed.

column.name: MobileWebPin
column.summary: A hashed pin that is used for mobile web validation on eClipboard. Not used in OD proper.

column.name: MobileWebPinFailedAttempts
column.summary: The number of attempts the mobile web pin has failed. Reset on successful attempt.
